description: AllClear, is a non-profit organization based in NYC dedicated to empowering communities with technology and data to overcome COVID-19 and get back on track. AllClear's app lets users find nearby test sites across all 50 states and US territories, and access key information, such as screening requirements based on an individual's symptoms. The app, the first of its kind, has created the most comprehensive database available, with over 9,000 verified test sites and counting.
link_title: The Idea: Build It, and They Can Find Coronavirus Tests (Published 2020)
